code: import axios from"axios";var url="http://localhost:3001/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newPerson){var request=axios.post(url,newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};var update=function update(id,d){var request=axios.put("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),d);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,update:update};
